FuncDef:
The display dfs authentication status command displays authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets.
The display fwm dfs authentication status command displays authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets generated by the FWM module, including MAC address entries. The display dfs authentication status command displays authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets. The display fwm dfs authentication status command displays authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets generated by the FWM module, including MAC address entries.
CLIs: display fwm dfs authentication status [ slot <slotid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a card.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 49 .Set the value according to the device configuration.
